casebody.data:
No. 11-432. Misty Raley, Individually and as Parent and Next Friend of C. G., W. G., and C. A. G., Minor Children, Petitioner v. Hyundai Motor Company, Ltd., et al. 565 U.S. 1062, 132 S. Ct. 779,

181 L. Ed. 2d 488,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8664. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 642 F.3d 1271.
